actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Joint resolution to enable the United States to organize an international conference on acid rain and snow in the Northern Hemisphere and the effect of such pollutants on world agriculture.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture, with the Secretary of State and the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, to organize and convene, during fiscal year 1978, an international conference of Northern Hemisphere nations on the effects of long-range transport of air pollutants, especially as manifested in acid rain and snow, on agricultural crops, livestock, forests, and associated ecosystems. Requires the Secretary to report to Congress on the conference and to make recommendations as to appropriate changes in domestic and foreign policy.

titles.title: Joint resolution to enable the United States to organize an international conference on acid rain and snow in the Northern Hemisphere and the effect of such pollutants on world agriculture.
